cause.description:
Enlarged prostate is a debilitating disease. It can lead to symptoms of urinary hesitancy, frequent urination, increased risk of urinary tract infections and urinary retention. It must be stopped before one more old man must suffer its effects.
1. A normal-sized prostate is a universal right of all men
2. Avodart is proven effective in shrinking the prostate, symptom improvement, and lower the chance for prostate surgery.
3. Ask your doctor if Avodart is right for you.
cause.mission: fight the Global War on Enlarged Prostates
cause.name: Stop Enlarged Prostate
